verses.name: Genesis 8:16
verses.text: Go forth of the ark, thou, and thy wife, and thy sons, and thy sons’ wives with thee.

verses.name: Genesis 8:17
verses.text: Bring forth with thee every living thing that is with thee, of all flesh, both of fowl, and of cattle, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth; that they may breed abundantly in the earth, and be fruitful, and multiply upon the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 8:18
verses.text: And Noah went forth, and his sons, and his wife, and his sons’ wives with him:
